subject: [Agents] QA, docs update, and regression verification for CP IA rollout
description:
Intent:
- Validate behavior and document new CP IA + ownership model.

Assumptions:
- Implementation tasks 5-8 completed.

Design + invariants:
- Endpoint/CLI behavior remains stable.
- Legacy CP aliases continue to work.

Diff plan:
- README.md (CP section, ownership split, tab map)
- optional DEVELOPMENT.md notes

Verification:
- Manual CP checks + relevant CLI/API smoke checks pass.
- No secrets rendered in CP.
